reports.title: 155 - List of non-printed will call tickets
reports.description: A list of all customers who have non-printed tickets for one or several events.

reports.title: 100 - Daily Sales
reports.description: Tickets (excluding consignment tickets) and comps sold on one day for all events.

reports.title: 102 - Sales Summary (S3M)
reports.description: A summary of total sales for a period, with details by performance.

reports.title: 105 - Sales for a Period
reports.description: Tickets sold (with details for regular, comp, and consignment tickets) for a period, as well as cumulative sales, with subtotals by venue.

reports.title: 106 - Sales for a Period (with separate consignment totals)
reports.description: Tickets sold (with details for regular, comp, and consignment tickets) for a period, as well as cumulative sales, with subtotals by venue. NB: This report separates the consignment total from the total of regular tickets.

reports.title: 120M - Daily Individual Sales
reports.description: List of transactions by origin, with an additional breakdown for box office cashiers.

reports.title: 130 - Audit Report
reports.description: A recap of the price table, sales, and seat statuses for events.

reports.title: 147 - Performance History
reports.description: A list of all transactions for a performance (as of November 30th 2010).

reports.title: 163 - Scanning History
reports.description: A detailed list of tickets and passes that were scanned into an event, in chronological order.

reports.title: 165c - Scanned Tickets (New)
reports.description: Details regarding scanned tickets and passes (for events taking place after August 15th 2011).

reports.title: 168b - Scanned tickets per customer
reports.description: Scanned tickets per customer (for events taking place after August 15th 2011).

reports.title: 385 - Customer List
reports.description: A list of customers who have purchased tickets for one or several events.

reports.title: 385a - Customer List with Extra Info
reports.description: A list of customers who have purchased tickets for one or several events with Extra Info
